settings.text1: Millions have trusted their wellness to Hyland's. We've been around since 1903!
settings.text2: We scour the earth to bring you plant-based ingredients that are safe, effective, and cruelty-free.
settings.text3: Our products are paraben-free and made without artificial flavors or dyes.
settings.text4: Our products are formulated and manufactured in state-of-the-art cGMP facilities in the USA.
settings.text5: Our products are free of top allergens, including peanuts, tree nuts, soy, wheat, milk proteins, eggs, fish or shellfish.
settings.text6: Yummy gummies, great-tasting liquid flavors, and easy-dissolve tablets make taking care of yourself & your kids easy.
